item.title: Why do I have a blog
item.description: Why? Get hired Who doesn’t want to get hired, I use this blog as a medium to attract great recruiters and companies who would potentially want to hire me. Improve my writing/language skills I am not a good writer (evident from this blog), but I am constantly striving to be better. I learn a new word for every visitor this page has. If you see me next time, don’t forget to ask me what the word “ ” means.

item.title: Tweedisc, a twitter integration bot
item.description: An application to use Twitter without leaving the comfort of Discord

item.title: Play Piano on a PC Keyboard
item.description: An idea/WIP that allows people to play (any) instruments on their laptop/pc
